TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReplySessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: Defines the interface to associate a reply channel with a session

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> interface indicates that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel> implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> semantics.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> associated with its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> can be retrieved through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> property.
